    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String itemName,
            double itemCost,
            double itemPrice,
            int reorderPoint,
            int reorderAmount,
            int itemTemp)
        This class represents an individual Item. Items are added to inventory's within the Stock class and Stock objects are added to the Store.
        Parameters:
        itemName - - The items name
        itemCost - - The price the Store pays for the item
        itemPrice - - The price the Store sells the item for
        reorderPoint - - The item is reordered if the amount in stock falls to this amount
        reorderAmount - - The amount to reorder
        itemTemp - - The items safe temperature, so it doesn't perish.

        Returns:
        reorderAmount

      • getTemp

        public int getTemp()
        Returns the items safe temperature. Between -20 and 10 for cold items. 999 for ordinary items.
        Returns:
        itemTemp

      • getQuantity

        public int getQuantity()
        Returns the quantity in stock
